rewards.reward_description: I'll add 20 bonus points to your grade at the end of the semester!
If you reach this milestone, you will receive at least a 10% homework score for this module.

If you reach this milestone, you will receive at least a 40% homework score for this module.

You may bring a 'cheat sheet' to the final exam. This cheat sheet can have anything on it EXCEPT example problems. I expect that you turn the sheet in with your exam.
I will drop your worst NONZERO homework. If you do not have any homework scores below 90%, I will add some bonus points instead.
I will drop your worst NONZERO quiz. If you do not have any quiz scores below 90%, I will add some bonus points instead.
